about_the_game:
MORGMAN is a first-person horror game, a hybrid of classic survival horror and puzzle.

You find yourself deep in the forest, in an abandoned mansion with a dark past. You'll need to explore its dark corridors and rooms while staying alive.

By gathering scattered clues and solving tricky puzzles, you'll come closer to unraveling the dark secrets of this place. And try not to become a victim of the unknown evil lurking within the mansion's walls, waiting for you in the most unexpected places.

Plot:

Your sister is an archaeologist and hasn't been in touch with you for the past few days. You managed to pinpoint her last location, which led you to a remote place deep in the Lapland forests...

Game Features:

  • Enemy: Intelligent, unpredictable, and adaptable. Every move you make forces it to learn and refine its hunting methods.

  • Adaptability and puzzles: Unravel the mansion's past by piecing together fragments of the family's memories through paintings, maps, and locks. Solve puzzles with wit, intelligence, or brute force, the choice is yours!

  • Horror atmosphere: A unique atmosphere of constant fear and tension, conveyed through visual and sound effects, will allow you to fully immerse yourself in the world of horror.

  • Exploration and survival: Resources are limited, enemies are strong, and there are many secrets. By exploring every corner of the mansion, you increase your chances of making it out alive.

short_description: MORGMAN is a first-person horror game. You find yourself deep in the woods, in an abandoned mansion, behind which lurks a dark past. Numerous puzzles await you to solve in order to uncover the mansion's secrets and move forward. Remember - to stay alive, use not only wit, but also caution.
